column3: utACK. The current process is described in the release process doc.

I think that BitcoinFoundation_Apple_Cert.pem should be moved to `contrib/macdeploy` since it is the cert used for signing MacOS releases although it is not the full chain in a format like the certs in `contrib/windeploy`
@achow101 I'll leave it to @theuni to add it anywhere else, if necessary, but I doubt that old cert is still the one used anywhere.
@laanwj It is the same cert: https://botbot.me/freenode/bitcoin-core-dev/2017-09-21/?msg=91373405&page=1 (IRC discussion about this)
Given that the certificate expires before the next release, I don't see the need to move it around.\n\nAnyway, what are the plans for signing upcoming releases?
